UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Salusin-beta, an antimicrobially active peptide against Gram-positive bacteria.
Literature.Author: Kimura M, Shindo M, Moriizumi T, Tagawa N, Fujinami A, Kato I, Uchida Y

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis NBRC 3513(MIC=>128µM),Bacillus megaterium ATCC 19213(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus aureus NBRC 12732(MIC=>128µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis NBRC 12933(MIC=>128µM)
